front.title: RTCP XR Block Type for inter-destination media synchronization

abstract.t: This document specifies an RTCP XR Block Type and associated SDP parameter for inter-destination media synchronization (IDMS). The RTCP Block Type is used to collect media play-out information from participants in a group watching a specific RTP media stream and to distribute a summary of the collected information so that the participants can synchronize play-out. Typical applications for inter-destination media synchronization are social TV, watching apart together and shared service control (i.e. applications where two or more geographically separated users are watching a media stream together).
